DESCRIPTOR.LABEL: COPO Single Cell RNA-Sequencing Checklist
DESCRIPTOR.NAME: COPO Single Cell RNA-Sequencing Checklist
DESCRIPTOR.DESCRIPTION: Minimum information to standardise metadata related to samples used in RNA seq experiments...

FIELD_GROUP.restrictionType: Any number or none of the fields
FIELD_GROUP.NAME: study
FIELD_GROUP.LABEL: Study

FIELD.LABEL: Study ID
FIELD.NAME: study_id
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A unique alphanumeric identifier for this study

FIELD.LABEL: First Name
FIELD.NAME: contact_first_name
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Given first name

FIELD.LABEL: Last Name
FIELD.NAME: contact_last_name
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Given last name.

FIELD.LABEL: Email
FIELD.NAME: contact_email
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Valid email address

FIELD.LABEL: Technology
FIELD.NAME: technology
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The sorting or visualisation technology used.

FIELD_GROUP.restrictionType: Any number or none of the fields
FIELD_GROUP.NAME: sample
FIELD_GROUP.LABEL: Sample

FIELD.LABEL: Sample ID
FIELD.NAME: sample_id
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A unique alphanumeric reference or identifier for the study.

FIELD.LABEL: Occurrence ID
FIELD.NAME: occurrenceID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An identifier of the strain of the organism, if applicable.

FIELD.LABEL: Tissue
FIELD.NAME: tissue
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The type of tissue sampled for the study.

FIELD.LABEL: Event Date
FIELD.NAME: eventDate
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The date when the sample was collected with year, month and day specified in the format, YYYY-MM-DD.

FIELD.LABEL: Accepted Name Usage
FIELD.NAME: acceptedNameUsage
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The full name, with authorship and date information if known, of the currently valid (zoological) or accepted (botanical) dwc:Taxon.

FIELD.LABEL: Accepted Name Usage ID
FIELD.NAME: acceptedNameUsageID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An identifier for the name usage (documented meaning of the name according to a source) of the currently valid (zoological) or accepted (botanical) taxon.

FIELD.LABEL: Access Rights
FIELD.NAME: accessRights
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Information about who can access the resource or an indication of its security status.

FIELD.LABEL: Associated Media
FIELD.NAME: associatedMedia
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A related resource that is referenced, cited, or otherwise associated to the sequence.

FIELD.LABEL: Associated Occurrences
FIELD.NAME: associatedOccurrences
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A list (concatenated and separated) of identifiers of other dwc:Occurrence records and their associations to this dwc:Occurrence.

FIELD.LABEL: Associated Organisms
FIELD.NAME: associatedOrganisms
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A list (concatenated and separated) of identifiers of other dwc:Organisms and the associations of this dwc:Organism to each of them.

FIELD.LABEL: Associated References
FIELD.NAME: associatedReferences
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A list (concatenated and separated) of identifiers (publication, bibliographic reference, global unique identifier, URI) of literature associated with the dwc:Occurrence.
FIELD.EXAMPLE: Christopher J. Conroy, Jennifer L. Neuwald. 2008. Phylogeographic study of the California vole, Microtus californicus Journal of Mammalogy, 89(3):755-767.

FIELD.LABEL: Associated Sequences
FIELD.NAME: associatedSequences
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A list (concatenated and separated) of identifiers (publication, global unique identifier, URI) of genetic sequence information associated with the dwc:MaterialEntity.

FIELD.LABEL: Associated Taxa
FIELD.NAME: associatedTaxa
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A list (concatenated and separated) of identifiers or names of dwc:Taxon records and the associations of this dwc:Occurrence to each of them.

FIELD.LABEL: Basis Of Record
FIELD.NAME: basisOfRecord
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The specific nature of the data record.

FIELD.LABEL: Bed
FIELD.NAME: bed
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The full name of the lithostratigraphic bed from which the dwc:MaterialEntity was collected.

FIELD.LABEL: Caste
FIELD.NAME: caste
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Categorisation of individuals for eusocial species (including some mammals and arthropods).

FIELD.LABEL: Catalog Number
FIELD.NAME: catalogNumber
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An identifier (preferably unique) for the record within the data set or collection.

FIELD.LABEL: Class
FIELD.NAME: class
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The full scientific name of the class in which the dwc:Taxon is classified.

FIELD.LABEL: Collection Code
FIELD.NAME: collectionCode
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The name, acronym, code, or initialism identifying the collection or data set from which the record was derived.

FIELD.LABEL: Collection ID
FIELD.NAME: collectionID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An identifier for the collection or dataset from which the record was derived.

FIELD.LABEL: Continent
FIELD.NAME: continent
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The name of the continent in which the dcterms:Location occurs.

FIELD.LABEL: Coordinate Precision
FIELD.NAME: coordinatePrecision
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A decimal representation of the precision of the coordinates given in the dwc:decimalLatitude and dwc:decimalLongitude.

FIELD.LABEL: Coordinate Uncertainty In Metres
FIELD.NAME: coordinateUncertaintyInMeters
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The horizontal distance (in meters) from the given dwc:decimalLatitude and dwc:decimalLongitude describing the smallest circle containing the whole of the dcterms:Location. Leave the value empty if the uncertainty is unknown, cannot be estimated, or is not applicable (because there are no coordinates). Zero is not a valid value for this term.

FIELD.LABEL: Country Code
FIELD.NAME: countryCode
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The standard code for the country in which the dcterms:Location occurs.

FIELD.LABEL: County
FIELD.NAME: county
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The full, unabbreviated name of the next smaller administrative region than stateProvince (county, shire, department, etc.) in which the dcterms:Location occurs.

FIELD.LABEL: Cultivar Epithet
FIELD.NAME: cultivarEpithet
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Part of the name of a cultivar, cultivar group or grex that follows the dwc:scientificName.

FIELD.LABEL: Data Generalisations
FIELD.NAME: dataGeneralizations
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Actions taken to make the shared data less specific or complete than in its original form. Suggests that alternative data of higher quality may be available on request.

FIELD.LABEL: Dataset ID
FIELD.NAME: datasetID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An identifier for the set of data. May be a global unique identifier or an identifier specific to a collection or institution.

FIELD.LABEL: Dataset Name
FIELD.NAME: datasetName
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The name identifying the data set from which the record was derived.

FIELD.LABEL: Date Identified
FIELD.NAME: dateIdentified
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The date on which the subject was determined as representing the dwc:Taxon.

FIELD.LABEL: Degree Of Establishment
FIELD.NAME: degreeOfEstablishment
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The degree to which a dwc:Organism survives, reproduces, and expands its range at the given place and time.

FIELD.LABEL: Disposition
FIELD.NAME: disposition
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The current state of a specimen with respect to the collection identified in dwc:collectionCode or dwc:collectionID.

FIELD.LABEL: Dynamic Properties
FIELD.NAME: dynamicProperties
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A list of additional measurements, facts, characteristics, or assertions about the record. Meant to provide a mechanism for structured content. Use a key:value encoding schema for a data interchange format such as JSON.

FIELD.LABEL: Earliest Age Or Lowest Stage
FIELD.NAME: earliestAgeOrLowestStage
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The full name of the earliest possible geochronologic age or lowest chronostratigraphic stage attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which the dwc:MaterialEntity was collected.

FIELD.LABEL: Earliest Eon Or Lowest Eonothem
FIELD.NAME: earliestEonOrLowestEonothem
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The full name of the earliest possible geochronologic eon or lowest chrono-stratigraphic eonothem or the informal name ("Precambrian") attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which the dwc:MaterialEntity was collected.

FIELD.LABEL: Earliest Epoch Or Lowest Series
FIELD.NAME: earliestEpochOrLowestSeries
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The full name of the earliest possible geochronologic epoch or lowest chronostratigraphic series attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which the dwc:MaterialEntity was collected.

FIELD.LABEL: Earliest Era Or Lowest Erathem
FIELD.NAME: earliestEraOrLowestErathem
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The full name of the earliest possible geochronologic era or lowest chronostratigraphic erathem attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which the dwc:MaterialEntity was collected.

FIELD.LABEL: Earliest Period Or Lowest System
FIELD.NAME: earliestPeriodOrLowestSystem
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The full name of the earliest possible geochronologic period or lowest chronostratigraphic system attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which the dwc:MaterialEntity was collected.

FIELD.LABEL: End Day Of Year
FIELD.NAME: endDayOfYear
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The latest integer day of the year on which the dwc:Event occurred (1 for January 1, 365 for December 31, except in a leap year, in which case it is 366).

FIELD.LABEL: Establishment Means
FIELD.NAME: establishmentMeans
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Statement about whether a dwc:Organism has been introduced to a given place and time through the direct or indirect activity of modern humans.

FIELD.LABEL: Event ID
FIELD.NAME: eventID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An identifier for the set of information associated with a dwc:Event (something that occurs at a place and time). May be a global unique identifier or an identifier specific to the data set.

FIELD.LABEL: Event Remarks
FIELD.NAME: eventRemarks
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Comments or notes about the dwc:Event.
FIELD.EXAMPLE: After the recent rains the river is nearly at flood stage.

FIELD.LABEL: Event Time
FIELD.NAME: eventTime
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The time or interval during which a dwc:Event occurred.

FIELD.LABEL: Event Type
FIELD.NAME: eventType
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The nature of the dwc:Event.

FIELD.LABEL: Field Notes
FIELD.NAME: fieldNotes
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: One of a) an indicator of the existence of, b) a reference to (publication, URI), or c) the text of notes taken in the field about the dwc:Event.
FIELD.EXAMPLE: Notes available in the Grinnell-Miller Library.

FIELD.LABEL: Field Number
FIELD.NAME: fieldNumber
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An identifier given to the event in the field. Often serves as a link between field notes and the dwc:Event.

FIELD.LABEL: Footprint SRS
FIELD.NAME: footprintSRS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The ellipsoid, geodetic datum, or spatial reference system (SRS) upon which the geometry given in dwc:footprintWKT is based.

FIELD.LABEL: Footprint Spatial Fit
FIELD.NAME: footprintSpatialFit
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The ratio of the area of the dwc:footprintWKT to the area of the True (original, or most specific) spatial representation of the dcterms:Location. Legal values are 0, greater than or equal to 1, or undefined. A value of 1 is an exact match or 100% overlap. A value of 0 should be used if the given dwc:footprintWKT does not completely contain the original representation. The dwc:footprintSpatialFit is undefined (and should be left empty) if the original representation is any geometry without area (e.g., a point or polyline) and without uncertainty and the given georeference is not that same geometry (without uncertainty). If both the original and the given georeference are the same point, the dwc:footprintSpatialFit is 1.

FIELD.LABEL: Footprint WKT
FIELD.NAME: footprintWKT
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A Well-Known Text (WKT) representation of the shape (footprint, geometry) that defines the dcterms:Location. A dcterms:Location may have both a point-radius representation (see dwc:decimalLatitude) and a footprint representation, and they may differ from each other.

FIELD.LABEL: Formation
FIELD.NAME: formation
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The full name of the lithostratigraphic formation from which the dwc:MaterialEntity was collected.

FIELD.LABEL: Generic Name
FIELD.NAME: genericName
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The genus part of the dwc:scientificName without authorship.

FIELD.LABEL: Geodetic Datum
FIELD.NAME: geodeticDatum
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The ellipsoid, geodetic datum, or spatial reference system (SRS) upon which the geographic coordinates given in dwc:decimalLatitude and dwc:decimalLongitude is based.

FIELD.LABEL: Geological Context ID
FIELD.NAME: geologicalContextID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An identifier for the set of information associated with a dwc:GeologicalContext (the location within a geological context, such as stratigraphy). May be a global unique identifier or an identifier specific to the data set.

FIELD.LABEL: Georeference Protocol
FIELD.NAME: georeferenceProtocol
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A description or reference to the methods used to determine the spatial footprint, coordinates, and uncertainties.
FIELD.EXAMPLE: Georeferencing Quick Reference Guide (Zermoglio et al. 2020, https://doi.org/10.35035/e09p-h128)

FIELD.LABEL: Georeference Remarks
FIELD.NAME: georeferenceRemarks
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Notes or comments about the spatial description determination, explaining assumptions made in addition or opposition to the those formalized in the method referred to in dwc:georeferenceProtocol.

FIELD.LABEL: Georeference Sources
FIELD.NAME: georeferenceSources
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A map, gazetteer, or other resource used to georeference the dcterms:Location.
FIELD.EXAMPLE: USGS 1:24000 Florence Montana Quad 1967 | Terrametrics 2008 on Google Earth

FIELD.LABEL: Georeference Verification Status
FIELD.NAME: georeferenceVerificationStatus
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A categorical description of the extent to which the georeference has been verified to represent the best possible spatial description for the dcterms:Location of the dwc:Occurrence.

FIELD.LABEL: Georeferenced By
FIELD.NAME: georeferencedBy
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A person, group, or organization who determined the georeference (spatial representation) for the dcterms:Location.

FIELD.LABEL: Georeferenced Date
FIELD.NAME: georeferencedDate
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The date on which the dcterms:Location was georeferenced.

FIELD.LABEL: Group
FIELD.NAME: group
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The full name of the lithostratigraphic group from which the dwc:MaterialEntity was collected.

FIELD.LABEL: Higher Classification
FIELD.NAME: higherClassification
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A list (concatenated and separated) of taxa names terminating at the rank immediately superior to the referenced dwc:Taxon.
FIELD.EXAMPLE: Plantae | Tracheophyta | Magnoliopsida | Ranunculales | Ranunculaceae | Ranunculus

FIELD.LABEL: Higher Geography
FIELD.NAME: higherGeography
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A list (concatenated and separated) of geographic names less specific than the information captured in the dwc:locality term.

FIELD.LABEL: Higher Geography ID
FIELD.NAME: higherGeographyID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An identifier for the geographic region within which the dcterms:Location occurred.

FIELD.LABEL: Highest Biostratigraphic Zone
FIELD.NAME: highestBiostratigraphicZone
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The full name of the highest possible geological biostratigraphic zone of the stratigraphic horizon from which the dwc:MaterialEntity was collected.

FIELD.LABEL: Identification ID
FIELD.NAME: identificationID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An identifier for the dwc:Identification (the body of information associated with the assignment of a scientific name). May be a global unique identifier or an identifier specific to the data set.

FIELD.LABEL: Identification Qualifier
FIELD.NAME: identificationQualifier
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A controlled value to express the determiner's doubts about the dwc:Identification.

FIELD.LABEL: Identification References
FIELD.NAME: identificationReferences
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A list (concatenated and separated) of references (publication, global unique identifier, URI) used in the dwc:Identification.
FIELD.EXAMPLE: Aves del Noroeste Patagonico. Christie et al. 2004.

FIELD.LABEL: Identification Remarks
FIELD.NAME: identificationRemarks
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Comments or notes about the dwc:Identification.
FIELD.EXAMPLE: Distinguished between Anthus correndera and Anthus hellmayri based on the comparative lengths of the uñas.

FIELD.LABEL: Identification Verification Status
FIELD.NAME: identificationVerificationStatus
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A categorical indicator of the extent to which the taxonomic identification has been verified to be correct.

FIELD.LABEL: Identified By
FIELD.NAME: identifiedBy
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A person, group, or organization who assigned the dwc:Taxon to the subject.

FIELD.LABEL: Identified By ID
FIELD.NAME: identifiedByID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A list (concatenated and separated) of the globally unique identifier for the person, people, groups, or organizations responsible for assigning the dwc:Taxon to the subject.

FIELD.LABEL: Individual Count
FIELD.NAME: individualCount
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The number of individuals present at the time of the dwc:Occurrence.

FIELD.LABEL: Information Withheld
FIELD.NAME: informationWithheld
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Additional information that exists, but that has not been shared in the given record.
FIELD.EXAMPLE: Location information not given for endangered species

FIELD.LABEL: Infrageneric Epithet
FIELD.NAME: infragenericEpithet
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The infrageneric part of a binomial name at ranks above species but below genus.

FIELD.LABEL: Infraspecific Epithet
FIELD.NAME: infraspecificEpithet
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The name of the lowest or terminal infraspecific epithet of the dwc:scientificName, excluding any rank designation.

FIELD.LABEL: Institution ID
FIELD.NAME: institutionID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An identifier for the institution having custody of the object(s) or information referred to in the record.

FIELD.LABEL: Island
FIELD.NAME: island
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The name of the island on or near which the dcterms:Location occurs.

FIELD.LABEL: Island Group
FIELD.NAME: islandGroup
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The name of the island group in which the dcterms:Location occurs.

FIELD.LABEL: Kingdom
FIELD.NAME: kingdom
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The full scientific name of the kingdom in which the dwc:Taxon is classified.

FIELD.LABEL: Language
FIELD.NAME: language
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A language of the resource.

FIELD.LABEL: Latest Age Or Highest Stage
FIELD.NAME: latestAgeOrHighestStage
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The full name of the latest possible geochronologic age or highest chronostratigraphic stage attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which the dwc:MaterialEntity was collected.

FIELD.LABEL: Latests Eon Or Highest Eonothem
FIELD.NAME: latestEonOrHighestEonothem
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The full name of the latest possible geochronologic eon or highest chrono-stratigraphic eonothem or the informal name ("Precambrian") attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which the dwc:MaterialEntity was collected.

FIELD.LABEL: Latest Epoch Or Highest Series
FIELD.NAME: latestEpochOrHighestSeries
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The full name of the latest possible geochronologic epoch or highest chronostratigraphic series attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which the dwc:MaterialEntity was collected.

FIELD.LABEL: Latest Era Or Highest Erathem
FIELD.NAME: latestEraOrHighestErathem
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The full name of the latest possible geochronologic era or highest chronostratigraphic erathem attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which the dwc:MaterialEntity was collected.

FIELD.LABEL: Latest Period Or Highest System
FIELD.NAME: latestPeriodOrHighestSystem
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The full name of the latest possible geochronologic period or highest chronostratigraphic system attributable to the stratigraphic horizon from which the dwc:MaterialEntity was collected.

FIELD.LABEL: License
FIELD.NAME: license
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A legal document giving official permission to do something with the resource.

FIELD.LABEL: Lithostratigraphic Terms
FIELD.NAME: lithostratigraphicTerms
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The combination of all litho-stratigraphic names for the rock from which the dwc:MaterialEntity was collected.

FIELD.LABEL: Locality
FIELD.NAME: locality
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The specific description of the place.

FIELD.LABEL: Location According To
FIELD.NAME: locationAccordingTo
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Information about the source of this dcterms:Location information. Could be a publication (gazetteer), institution, or team of individuals.

FIELD.LABEL: Location ID
FIELD.NAME: locationID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An identifier for the set of dcterms:Location information. May be a global unique identifier or an identifier specific to the data set.

FIELD.LABEL: Location Remarks
FIELD.NAME: locationRemarks
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Comments or notes about the dcterms:Location.

FIELD.LABEL: Lowest Biostratigraphic Zone
FIELD.NAME: lowestBiostratigraphicZone
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The full name of the lowest possible geological biostratigraphic zone of the stratigraphic horizon from which the dwc:MaterialEntity was collected.

FIELD.LABEL: Material Entity Remarks
FIELD.NAME: materialEntityRemarks
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Comments or notes about the dwc:MaterialEntity instance.
FIELD.EXAMPLE: found in association with charred remains

FIELD.LABEL: Maximum Depth In Metres
FIELD.NAME: maximumDepthInMeters
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The greater depth of a range of depth below the local surface, in metres.

FIELD.LABEL: Maximum Distance Above Surface In Metres
FIELD.NAME: maximumDistanceAboveSurfaceInMeters
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The greater distance in a range of distance from a reference surface in the vertical direction, in meters. Use positive values for locations above the surface, negative values for locations below. If depth measures are given, the reference surface is the location given by the depth, otherwise the reference surface is the location given by the elevation.

FIELD.LABEL: Maximum Elevation In Metres
FIELD.NAME: maximumElevationInMeters
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The upper limit of the range of elevation (altitude, usually above sea level), in metres.

FIELD.LABEL: Measurement Accuracy
FIELD.NAME: measurementAccuracy
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The description of the potential error associated with the dwc:measurementValue.

FIELD.LABEL: Measurement Determined By
FIELD.NAME: measurementDeterminedBy
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A person, group, or organization who determined the value of the dwc:MeasurementOrFact.

FIELD.LABEL: Measurement Determined Date
FIELD.NAME: measurementDeterminedDate
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The date on which the dwc:MeasurementOrFact was made.

FIELD.LABEL: Measurement ID
FIELD.NAME: measurementID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An identifier for the dwc:MeasurementOrFact (information pertaining to measurements, facts, characteristics, or assertions). May be a global unique identifier or an identifier specific to the data set.

FIELD.LABEL: Measurement Method
FIELD.NAME: measurementMethod
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The method or protocol used to determine the measurement, fact, characteristic, or assertion.

FIELD.LABEL: Measurement Remarks
FIELD.NAME: measurementRemarks
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Comments or notes accompanying the dwc:MeasurementOrFact.

FIELD.LABEL: Measurement Type
FIELD.NAME: measurementType
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The nature of the measurement, fact, characteristic, or assertion.

FIELD.LABEL: Measurement Unit
FIELD.NAME: measurementUnit
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The units associated with the dwc:measurementValue.

FIELD.LABEL: Measurement Value
FIELD.NAME: measurementValue
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The value of the measurement, fact, characteristic, or assertion.

FIELD.LABEL: Member
FIELD.NAME: member
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The full name of the lithostratigraphic member from which the dwc:MaterialEntity was collected.

FIELD.LABEL: Minimum Depth In Metres
FIELD.NAME: minimumDepthInMeters
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The lesser depth of a range of depth below the local surface, in metres.

FIELD.LABEL: Minimum Distance Above Surface In Metres
FIELD.NAME: minimumDistanceAboveSurfaceInMeters
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The lesser distance in a range of distance from a reference surface in the vertical direction, in meters. Use positive values for locations above the surface, negative values for locations below. If depth measures are given, the reference surface is the location given by the depth, otherwise the reference surface is the location given by the elevation.

FIELD.LABEL: Minimum Elevation In Metres
FIELD.NAME: minimumElevationInMeters
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The lower limit of the range of elevation (altitude, usually above sea level), in metres

FIELD.LABEL: Modified
FIELD.NAME: modified
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The most recent date-time on which the resource was changed.

FIELD.LABEL: Municipality
FIELD.NAME: municipality
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The full, unabbreviated name of the next smaller administrative region than county (city, municipality, etc.) in which the dcterms:Location occurs. Do not use this term for a nearby named place that does not contain the actual dcterms:Location.

FIELD.LABEL: Name According To
FIELD.NAME: nameAccordingTo
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The reference to the source in which the specific taxon concept circumscription is defined or implied - traditionally signified by the Latin "sensu" or "sec." (from secundum, meaning "according to"). For taxa that result from identifications, a reference to the keys, monographs, experts and other sources should be given.
FIELD.EXAMPLE: Franz NM, Cardona-Duque J (2013) Description of two new species and phylogenetic reassessment of Perelleschus Wibmer & O'Brien, 1986 (Coleoptera: Curculionidae), with a complete taxonomic concept history of Perelleschus sec. Franz & Cardona-Duque, 2013. Syst Biodivers. 11: 209-236.

FIELD.LABEL: Name According To ID
FIELD.NAME: nameAccordingToID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An identifier for the source in which the specific taxon concept circumscription is defined or implied. See dwc:nameAccordingTo.

FIELD.LABEL: Name Published In
FIELD.NAME: namePublishedIn
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A reference for the publication in which the dwc:scientificName was originally established under the rules of the associated dwc:nomenclaturalCode.
FIELD.EXAMPLE: Pearson O. P., and M. I. Christie. 1985. Historia Natural, 5(37):388

FIELD.LABEL: Name Published In ID
FIELD.NAME: namePublishedInID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An identifier for the publication in which the dwc:scientificName was originally established under the rules of the associated dwc:nomenclaturalCode.

FIELD.LABEL: Name Published In Year
FIELD.NAME: namePublishedInYear
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The four-digit year in which the dwc:scientificName was published.

FIELD.LABEL: Nomenclatural Code
FIELD.NAME: nomenclaturalCode
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The nomenclatural code (or codes in the case of an ambiregnal name) under which the dwc:scientificName is constructed.

FIELD.LABEL: Nomenclatural Status
FIELD.NAME: nomenclaturalStatus
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The status related to the original publication of the name and its conformance to the relevant rules of nomenclature. It is based essentially on an algorithm according to the business rules of the code. It requires no taxonomic opinion.

FIELD.LABEL: Occurrence Remarks
FIELD.NAME: occurrenceRemarks
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Comments or notes about the dwc:Occurrence.

FIELD.LABEL: Occurrence Status
FIELD.NAME: occurrenceStatus
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A statement about the presence or absence of a dwc:Taxon at a dcterms:Location.

FIELD.LABEL: Organism ID
FIELD.NAME: organismID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An identifier for the dwc:Organism instance (as opposed to a particular digital record of the dwc:Organism). May be a globally unique identifier or an identifier specific to the data set.

FIELD.LABEL: Organism Quantity
FIELD.NAME: organismQuantity
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A number or enumeration value for the quantity of dwc:Organisms.

FIELD.LABEL: Organism Quantity Type
FIELD.NAME: organismQuantityType
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The type of quantification system used for the quantity of organisms.

FIELD.LABEL: Organism Remarks
FIELD.NAME: organismRemarks
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Comments or notes about the dwc:Organism instance.
FIELD.EXAMPLE: One of a litter of six

FIELD.LABEL: Organism Scope
FIELD.NAME: organismScope
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A description of the kind of dwc:Organism instance. Can be used to indicate whether the dwc:Organism instance represents a discrete organism or if it represents a particular type of aggregation.

FIELD.LABEL: Original Name Usage
FIELD.NAME: originalNameUsage
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The taxon name, with authorship and date information if known, as it originally appeared when first established under the rules of the associated dwc:nomenclaturalCode. The basionym (botany) or basonym (bacteriology) of the dwc:scientificName or the senior/earlier homonym for replaced names.

FIELD.LABEL: Original Name Usage ID
FIELD.NAME: originalNameUsageID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An identifier for the name usage (documented meaning of the name according to a source) in which the terminal element of the dwc:scientificName was originally established under the rules of the associated dwc:nomenclaturalCode.

FIELD.LABEL: Other Catalog Numbers
FIELD.NAME: otherCatalogNumbers
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A list (concatenated and separated) of previous or alternate fully qualified catalog numbers or other human-used identifiers for the same dwc:Occurrence, whether in the current or any other data set or collection.

FIELD.LABEL: Owner Institution Code
FIELD.NAME: ownerInstitutionCode
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The name (or acronym) in use by the institution having ownership of the object(s) or information referred to in the record.

FIELD.LABEL: Parent Event ID
FIELD.NAME: parentEventID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An identifier for the broader dwc:Event that groups this and potentially other dwc:Events.

FIELD.LABEL: Parent Measurement ID
FIELD.NAME: parentMeasurementID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An identifier for a broader dwc:MeasurementOrFact that groups this and potentially other dwc:MeasurementOrFacts.

FIELD.LABEL: Parent Name Usage
FIELD.NAME: parentNameUsage
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The full name, with authorship and date information if known, of the direct, most proximate higher-rank parent dwc:Taxon (in a classification) of the most specific element of the dwc:scientificName.

FIELD.LABEL: Parent Name Usage ID
FIELD.NAME: parentNameUsageID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An identifier for the name usage (documented meaning of the name according to a source) of the direct, most proximate higher-rank parent taxon (in a classification) of the most specific element of the dwc:scientificName.

FIELD.LABEL: Pathway
FIELD.NAME: pathway
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The process by which a dwc:Organism came to be in a given place at a given time.

FIELD.LABEL: Phylum
FIELD.NAME: phylum
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The full scientific name of the phylum or division in which the dwc:Taxon is classified.

FIELD.LABEL: Point Radius Spatial Fit
FIELD.NAME: pointRadiusSpatialFit
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The ratio of the area of the point-radius (dwc:decimalLatitude, dwc:decimalLongitude, dwc:coordinateUncertaintyInMeters) to the area of the True (original, or most specific) spatial representation of the dcterms:Location. Legal values are 0, greater than or equal to 1, or undefined. A value of 1 is an exact match or 100% overlap. A value of 0 should be used if the given point-radius does not completely contain the original representation. The dwc:pointRadiusSpatialFit is undefined (and should be left empty) if the original representation is any geometry without area (e.g., a point or polyline) and without uncertainty and the given georeference is not that same geometry (without uncertainty). If both the original and the given georeference are the same point, the dwc:pointRadiusSpatialFit is 1.

FIELD.LABEL: Previous Identifications
FIELD.NAME: previousIdentifications
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A list (concatenated and separated) of previous assignments of names to the dwc:Organism.

FIELD.LABEL: Recorded By
FIELD.NAME: recordedBy
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A person, group, or organization responsible for recording the original dwc:Occurrence.

FIELD.LABEL: Recorded By ID
FIELD.NAME: recordedByID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A list (concatenated and separated) of the globally unique identifier for the person, people, groups, or organizations responsible for recording the original dwc:Occurrence.

FIELD.LABEL: References
FIELD.NAME: references
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A related resource that is referenced, cited, or otherwise pointed to by the described resource.

FIELD.LABEL: Related Resource ID
FIELD.NAME: relatedResourceID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An identifier for a related resource (the object, rather than the subject of the relationship).

FIELD.LABEL: Relationship According To
FIELD.NAME: relationshipAccordingTo
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The source (person, organization, publication, reference) establishing the relationship between the two resources.

FIELD.LABEL: Relationship Established Date
FIELD.NAME: relationshipEstablishedDate
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The date-time on which the relationship between the two resources was established.

FIELD.LABEL: Relationship Of Resource
FIELD.NAME: relationshipOfResource
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The relationship of the subject (identified by dwc:resourceID) to the object (identified by dwc:relatedResourceID).

FIELD.LABEL: Relationship Of Resource ID
FIELD.NAME: relationshipOfResourceID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An identifier for the relationship type (predicate) that connects the subject identified by dwc:resourceID to its object identified by dwc:relatedResourceID.

FIELD.LABEL: Relationship Remarks
FIELD.NAME: relationshipRemarks
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Comments or notes about the relationship between the two resources.
FIELD.EXAMPLE: mother and offspring collected from the same nest

FIELD.LABEL: Reproductive Condition
FIELD.NAME: reproductiveCondition
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The reproductive condition of the biological individual(s) represented in the dwc:Occurrence.

FIELD.LABEL: Resource ID
FIELD.NAME: resourceID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An identifier for the resource that is the subject of the relationship.

FIELD.LABEL: Resource Relationship ID
FIELD.NAME: resourceRelationshipID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An identifier for an instance of relationship between one resource (the subject) and another (dwc:relatedResource, the object).

FIELD.LABEL: Rights Holder
FIELD.NAME: rightsHolder
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A person or organization owning or managing rights over the resource.
FIELD.EXAMPLE: The Regents of the University of California

FIELD.LABEL: Sample Size Unit
FIELD.NAME: sampleSizeUnit
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The unit of measurement of the size (time duration, length, area, or volume) of a sample in a sampling dwc:Event.

FIELD.LABEL: Sample Size Value
FIELD.NAME: sampleSizeValue
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A numeric value for a measurement of the size (time duration, length, area, or volume) of a sample in a sampling dwc:Event.

FIELD.LABEL: Sampling Effort
FIELD.NAME: samplingEffort
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The amount of effort expended during a dwc:Event.

FIELD.LABEL: Sampling Protocol
FIELD.NAME: samplingProtocol
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The methods or protocols used during a dwc:Event, denoted by an IRI.

FIELD.LABEL: Scientific Name Authorship
FIELD.NAME: scientificNameAuthorship
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The authorship information for the dwc:scientificName formatted according to the conventions of the applicable dwc:nomenclaturalCode.

FIELD.LABEL: Scientific Name ID
FIELD.NAME: scientificNameID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An identifier for the nomenclatural (not taxonomic) details of a scientific name.

FIELD.LABEL: Specific Epithet
FIELD.NAME: specificEpithet
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The name of the first or species epithet of the dwc:scientificName.

FIELD.LABEL: Start Day Of Year
FIELD.NAME: startDayOfYear
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The earliest integer day of the year on which the dwc:Event occurred (1 for January 1, 365 for December 31, except in a leap year, in which case it is 366).

FIELD.LABEL: State Province
FIELD.NAME: stateProvince
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The name of the next smaller administrative region than country (state, province, canton, department, region, etc.) in which the dcterms:Location occurs.

FIELD.LABEL: Subfamily
FIELD.NAME: subfamily
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The full scientific name of the subfamily in which the dwc:Taxon is classified.

FIELD.LABEL: Subgenus
FIELD.NAME: subgenus
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The full scientific name of the subgenus in which the dwc:Taxon is classified. Values should include the genus to avoid homonym confusion.

FIELD.LABEL: Subtribe
FIELD.NAME: subtribe
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The full scientific name of the subtribe in which the dwc:Taxon is classified.

FIELD.LABEL: Superfamily
FIELD.NAME: superfamily
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The full scientific name of the superfamily in which the dwc:Taxon is classified.

FIELD.LABEL: Taxon Concept ID
FIELD.NAME: taxonConceptID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An identifier for the taxonomic concept to which the record refers - not for the nomenclatural details of a dwc:Taxon.

FIELD.LABEL: Taxon Remarks
FIELD.NAME: taxonRemarks
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Comments or notes about the taxon or name.
FIELD.EXAMPLE: this name is a misspelling in common use

FIELD.LABEL: Taxonomic Status
FIELD.NAME: taxonomicStatus
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The status of the use of the dwc:scientificName as a label for a taxon. Requires taxonomic opinion to define the scope of a dwc:Taxon. Rules of priority then are used to define the taxonomic status of the nomenclature contained in that scope, combined with the experts opinion. It must be linked to a specific taxonomic reference that defines the concept.

FIELD.LABEL: Tribe
FIELD.NAME: tribe
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The full scientific name of the tribe in which the dwc:Taxon is classified.

FIELD.LABEL: Type
FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The nature or genre of the resource.

FIELD.LABEL: Type Status
FIELD.NAME: typeStatus
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A nomenclatural type (type status, typified scientific name, publication) applied to the subject.
FIELD.EXAMPLE: holotype of Pinus abies | holotype of Picea abies

FIELD.LABEL: Verbatim Coordinate System
FIELD.NAME: verbatimCoordinateSystem
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The spatial coordinate system for the dwc:verbatimLatitude and dwc:verbatimLongitude or the dwc:verbatimCoordinates of the dcterms:Location.

FIELD.LABEL: Verbatim Coordinates
FIELD.NAME: verbatimCoordinates
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The verbatim original spatial coordinates of the dcterms:Location. The coordinate ellipsoid, geodeticDatum, or full Spatial Reference System (SRS) for these coordinates should be stored in dwc:verbatimSRS and the coordinate system should be stored in dwc:verbatimCoordinateSystem.

FIELD.LABEL: Verbatim Depth
FIELD.NAME: verbatimDepth
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The original description of the depth below the local surface.

FIELD.LABEL: Verbatim Elevation
FIELD.NAME: verbatimElevation
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The original description of the elevation (altitude, usually above sea level) of the Location.

FIELD.LABEL: Verbatim Event Date
FIELD.NAME: verbatimEventDate
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The verbatim original representation of the date and time information for a dwc:Event.

FIELD.LABEL: Verbatim Identification
FIELD.NAME: verbatimIdentification
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A string representing the taxonomic identification as it appeared in the original record.

FIELD.LABEL: Verbatim Label
FIELD.NAME: verbatimLabel
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The content of this term should include no embellishments, prefixes, headers or other additions made to the text. Abbreviations must not be expanded and supposed misspellings must not be corrected. Lines or breakpoints between blocks of text that could be verified by seeing the original labels or images of them may be used. Examples of material entities include preserved specimens, fossil specimens, and material samples. Best practice is to use UTF-8 for all characters. Best practice is to add comment ‚ÄúverbatimLabel derived from human transcription‚Äù in dwc:occurrenceRemarks.

FIELD.LABEL: Verbatim Latitude
FIELD.NAME: verbatimLatitude
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The verbatim original latitude of the dcterms:Location. The coordinate ellipsoid, geodeticDatum, or full Spatial Reference System (SRS) for these coordinates should be stored in dwc:verbatimSRS and the coordinate system should be stored in dwc:verbatimCoordinateSystem.

FIELD.LABEL: Verbatim Locationality
FIELD.NAME: verbatimLocality
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The original textual description of the place.
FIELD.EXAMPLE: 25 km NNE Bariloche por R. Nac. 237

FIELD.LABEL: Verbatim Longitude
FIELD.NAME: verbatimLongitude
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The verbatim original longitude of the dcterms:Location. The coordinate ellipsoid, geodeticDatum, or full Spatial Reference System (SRS) for these coordinates should be stored in dwc:verbatimSRS and the coordinate system should be stored in dwc:verbatimCoordinateSystem.

FIELD.LABEL: Verbatim SRS
FIELD.NAME: verbatimSRS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The ellipsoid, geodetic datum, or spatial reference system (SRS) upon which coordinates given in dwc:verbatimLatitude and dwc:verbatimLongitude, or dwc:verbatimCoordinates are based.

FIELD.LABEL: Verbatim Taxon Rank
FIELD.NAME: verbatimTaxonRank
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The taxonomic rank of the most specific name in the dwc:scientificName as it appears in the original record.

FIELD.LABEL: Vernacular Name
FIELD.NAME: vernacularName
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A common or vernacular name.

FIELD.LABEL: Vertical Datum
FIELD.NAME: verticalDatum
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The vertical datum used as the reference upon which the values in the elevation terms are based.

FIELD.LABEL: Vitality
FIELD.NAME: vitality
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An indication of whether a dwc:Organism was alive or dead at the time of collection or observation.

FIELD.LABEL: Water Body
FIELD.NAME: waterBody
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The name of the water body in which the dcterms:Location occurs.

FIELD.LABEL: Material Sample ID
FIELD.NAME: materialSampleID
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An identifier for the dwc:MaterialSample (as opposed to a particular digital record of the dwc:MaterialSample). In the absence of a persistent global unique identifier, construct one from a combination of identifiers in the record that will most closely make the dwc:materialSampleID globally unique.

FIELD_GROUP.restrictionType: Any number or none of the fields
FIELD_GROUP.NAME: dissociation
FIELD_GROUP.LABEL: Dissociation

FIELD.LABEL: Dissociation Protocol ID
FIELD.NAME: dissociation_protocol_id
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A unique alphanumeric code for the dissociation protocol in the study

FIELD.LABEL: Protocol Name
FIELD.NAME: protocol_name
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A descriptive name of the protocol used for single-cell sequencing.

FIELD.LABEL: Dissociation Description
FIELD.NAME: dissociation_description
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A free-text description of the process used to separate cells from tissues or cell aggregates.
FIELD.EXAMPLE: Tissue was enzymatically dissociated using collagenase for 30 minutes.

FIELD.LABEL: Enrichment Markers
FIELD.NAME: enrichment_markers
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A free-text description of the markers used to enrich specific cell types during single-cell isolation.

FIELD.LABEL: Isolation Kit
FIELD.NAME: isolation_kit
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The kit used to isolate the cells.

FIELD.LABEL: Literature Source Reference
FIELD.NAME: literature_source_reference
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Reference to literature sources that describe the protocol or methods used.
FIELD.EXAMPLE: Doe et al. (2024), 'Single-cell RNA-seq: A comprehensive overview'

FIELD.LABEL: Protocols Io Reference
FIELD.NAME: protocols_io_reference
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Reference link to protocols.io for additional details on the protocol.

FIELD.LABEL: Workflowhub Sop Reference
FIELD.NAME: workflow_hub_SOP_reference
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Reference to the Standard Operating Procedure (SOP) in workflow hub.

FIELD.LABEL: Dissociation Protocol Method
FIELD.NAME: dissociation_protocol_method
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The method used to dissociate tissues into single cells.

FIELD.LABEL: Single Cell Quality Metric
FIELD.NAME: single_cell_quality_metric
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Metrics used to assess the quality of single cells before sequencing.

FIELD_GROUP.restrictionType: Any number or none of the fields
FIELD_GROUP.NAME: cell_suspension
FIELD_GROUP.LABEL: Cell Suspension

FIELD.LABEL: Sample ID
FIELD.NAME: sample_id
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A unique alphanumeric reference or identifier assigned to the cell suspension for the sample in the study.

FIELD.LABEL: Dissociation Protocol ID
FIELD.NAME: dissociation_protocol_id
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A unique alphanumeric code for the dissociation protocol in the study

FIELD.LABEL: Cell Suspension ID
FIELD.NAME: cell_suspension_id
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A unique alphanumeric code for the cell suspension for the sample

FIELD.LABEL: Suspension Type
FIELD.NAME: suspension_type
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The type of suspension used to keep cells in solution during processing.

FIELD.LABEL: Cell Count
FIELD.NAME: cell_count
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: An number representing the number of cells in the sequencing library.

FIELD.LABEL: Cell Viability
FIELD.NAME: cell_viability
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The percentage of living cells in a sample, indicating the health and quality of cells for RNA-sequencing analysis.

FIELD.LABEL: Cell Viability Assessment Method
FIELD.NAME: cell_viability_assessment_method
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The method used to evaluate the viability of cells in the sample, often involving staining or flow cytometry techniques.

FIELD.LABEL: Cell Size
FIELD.NAME: cell_size
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The size of the cell, typically measured in micrometres.

FIELD.LABEL: Suspension Volume Μl
FIELD.NAME: suspension_volume_µl
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The volume of the cell suspension in microlitres.

FIELD.LABEL: Suspension Concentration Cells Per Μl
FIELD.NAME: suspension_concentration_cells_per_µl
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The concentration of cells in the suspension.

FIELD.LABEL: Suspension Dilution
FIELD.NAME: suspension_dilution
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The dilution factor of the cell suspension.

FIELD.LABEL: Loading Volume Μl
FIELD.NAME: loading_volume_µl
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The volume of the cell suspension loaded into the single-cell RNA-sequencing system for analysis.

FIELD.LABEL: Suspension Dilution Buffer
FIELD.NAME: suspension_dilution_buffer
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A solution used to dilute cell suspensions to a desired concentration, typically prior to loading cells into a device for single-cell RNA sequencing. It helps maintain cell viability and integrity during processing.
FIELD.EXAMPLE: PBS (Phosphate-buffered saline) with 0.04% BSA (Bovine serum albumin)

FIELD_GROUP.restrictionType: Any number or none of the fields
FIELD_GROUP.NAME: lib_prep
FIELD_GROUP.LABEL: Library Preparation

FIELD.LABEL: Library Preparation ID
FIELD.NAME: library_prep_id
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A unique alphanumeric reference or identifier for the library preparation protocol used during the sequencing.

FIELD.LABEL: Cell Suspension ID
FIELD.NAME: cell_suspension_id
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A unique alphanumeric code for the cell suspension for the library preparation.

FIELD.LABEL: Library Preparation Kit Version
FIELD.NAME: library_prep_kit_version
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The version number of the library preparation kit used for sequencing.

FIELD.LABEL: Average Size Distribution
FIELD.NAME: average_size_distribution
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The average length of RNA fragments in base pairs (BP) after library preparation, indicating the quality and suitability of the RNA for sequencing.

FIELD.LABEL: Primeness
FIELD.NAME: primeness
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The end from which the molecule was sequenced.

FIELD.LABEL: i5 Index
FIELD.NAME: i5_index
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Barcode sequence used on the i5 adapter during library preparation for identifying samples in multiplexed single-cell RNA-sequencing.

FIELD.LABEL: i7 Index
FIELD.NAME: i7_index
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Barcode sequence used on the i7 adapter to distinguish samples in multiplexed sequencing runs.

FIELD.LABEL: Dual or Single Index
FIELD.NAME: dual_single_index
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Specifies if both i5 and i7 indices (dual) or only one index (single) was used for sample identification during sequencing.

FIELD.LABEL: Index Length
FIELD.NAME: index_length
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The length (in base pairs) of the index sequences used (i5 and/or i7).

FIELD.LABEL: I5 Sequence
FIELD.NAME: i5_sequence
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The nucleotide sequence of the i5 index used in multiplexing during sequencing.

FIELD.LABEL: i7 Sequence
FIELD.NAME: i7_sequence
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The specific nucleotide sequence of the i7 index used for a sample.

FIELD.LABEL: Plate ID
FIELD.NAME: plate_id
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Identifier for the 96-well plate used in sample preparation.

FIELD.LABEL: Well Row
FIELD.NAME: well_row
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The row identifier in a 96-well plate indicating the sample's position.

FIELD.LABEL: Well Column
FIELD.NAME: well_col
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The column identifier in a 96-well plate indicating the sample's position.

FIELD.LABEL: Cell Phenotype
FIELD.NAME: cell_phenotype
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The cell marker for the Fluorescence-Activated Cell Sorting (FACS) of cells.

FIELD_GROUP.restrictionType: Any number or none of the fields
FIELD_GROUP.NAME: sequencing
FIELD_GROUP.LABEL: Sequencing

FIELD.LABEL: Sequencing ID
FIELD.NAME: sequencing_id
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A unique alphanumeric reference or identifier for the sequencing protocol.

FIELD.LABEL: Sequencing Platform Name
FIELD.NAME: sequencing_platform_name
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The name of the sequencing platform used for the experiment.

FIELD.LABEL: Sequencing Instrument Model
FIELD.NAME: sequencing_instrument_model
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: This refers to the machine or platform used for sequencing, with variations in throughput, read lengths, error rates, and application suitability.

FIELD.LABEL: Library Layout
FIELD.NAME: library_layout
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The type of library layout used for sequencing.

FIELD.LABEL: Desired Reads Per Cell
FIELD.NAME: desired_reads_per_cell
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The ideal number of sequencing reads to be generated per cell.

FIELD.LABEL: Cell Barcode Offset
FIELD.NAME: cell_barcode_offset
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The offset in sequence of the cell identifying barcode.

FIELD.LABEL: Cell Barcode Size
FIELD.NAME: cell_barcode_size
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The offset in sequence of the cell identifying barcode. E.g. "0".

FIELD.LABEL: cDNA Read
FIELD.NAME: cDNA_read
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The actual nucleotide sequence obtained from Complementary DNA (cDNA) during sequencing.

FIELD.LABEL: cDNA Read Offset
FIELD.NAME: cDNA_read_offset
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The starting position of the Complementary DNA (cDNA) read within the entire sequence, indicating where the read begins after any barcodes or technical sequences.

FIELD.LABEL: cDNA Read Size
FIELD.NAME: cDNA_read_size
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The size of the Complementary DNA (cDNA) read.

FIELD_GROUP.restrictionType: Any number or none of the fields
FIELD_GROUP.NAME: file
FIELD_GROUP.LABEL: File

FIELD.LABEL: Library Preparation ID
FIELD.NAME: lib_prep_id
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A unique alphanumeric reference or identifier for the library preparation protocol used during the sequencing.

FIELD.LABEL: Sequencing ID
FIELD.NAME: sequencing_id
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A unique alphanumeric reference or identifier for the sequencing protocol.

FIELD.LABEL: Read 1 File
FIELD.NAME: read_1_file
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The name of the file that contains read 1.

FIELD.LABEL: Read 2 File
FIELD.NAME: read_2_file
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The name of the file that contains read 2.

FIELD.LABEL: Index 1 File
FIELD.NAME: index_1_file
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The name of the file that contains index 1.

FIELD.LABEL: Index 2 File
FIELD.NAME: index_2_file
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The name of the file that contains index 2.

FIELD.LABEL: Read Checksum
FIELD.NAME: read_checksum
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Result of a hash function calculated on the content of both the read 1 file and the read 2 file to verify file integrity. Commonly used algorithms include MD5 and SHA-1. The checksums should be separated by a comma (,).

FIELD.LABEL: Index Checksum
FIELD.NAME: index_checksum
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Result of a hash function calculated on the content of both the index 1 file and the index 2 file to verify file integrity. Commonly used algorithms include MD5 and SHA-1. The checksums should be separated by a comma (,).

FIELD.LABEL: White List Barcode File
FIELD.NAME: white_list_barcode_file
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: A file containing the known cell barcodes in the dataset.

FIELD_GROUP.restrictionType: Any number or none of the fields
FIELD_GROUP.NAME: raw_data_processing
FIELD_GROUP.LABEL: Raw Data Processing

FIELD.LABEL: Reference Genome
FIELD.NAME: reference_genome
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Indicate version and include stable link to genome data (or attach genome fasta file).

FIELD.LABEL: Genes vs Exons
FIELD.NAME: genes_vs_exons
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Quantification using whole gene intervals or exons.

FIELD.LABEL: Library Structure
FIELD.NAME: library_structure
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: seqspec format

FIELD.LABEL: Mapping and Demultiplexing Software
FIELD.NAME: mapping_and_demultiplexing_software
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Reads/UMI

FIELD.LABEL: Read Mapping Statistics
FIELD.NAME: read_mapping_statistics
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Statistics of the Reads or Unique Molecular Identifier (UMI).

FIELD.LABEL: Sequencing Saturation
FIELD.NAME: sequencing_saturation
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Depending on number of cells recovered (not targeted) and technology

FIELD.LABEL: UMIs or Barcode Distribution QC
FIELD.NAME: umis_barcode_distribution_qc
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Show Unique Molecular Identifiers (UMIs) per barcode distribution and threshold applied

FIELD.LABEL: Cell or Non-Cell Filtering Strategy
FIELD.NAME: cell_non_cell_filtering_strategy
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Unique Molecular Identifier (UMI) threshold used to discriminate cells from non-cells. Description of algorithm (if any) and parameters used to determine cells or non-cells.

FIELD.LABEL: Other Quality Filters Applied
FIELD.NAME: other_quality_filters_applied
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Cells/nuclei discarded based on % mitochondrial reads, % rRNA reads, etc.

FIELD.LABEL: Ambient RNA QC
FIELD.NAME: ambient_rna_qc
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Report % UMIs in background cell barcodes, and algorithm (if any) used to remove ambient RNA
FIELD.EXAMPLE: Ambient RNA removed if >5% UMIs in background barcodes

FIELD.LABEL: Predicted Doublet Rate QC
FIELD.NAME: predicted_doublet_rate_qc
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Depending on number of cells recovered (not targeted) and technology
